name: Dict.cc dark translation
description: A dark theme for the translation page of dict.cc
additional_info:
2017-01-23
 - Dark Login / Signup iframe
 - Dark details page

2015-04-28
 - Apply to subdomains of dict.cc to support multiple language translations
 - Dark Translations-not-found page
 - Make elements on Main-page dark
 - Make news-elements dark
 - Make context-menu dark
